column1: Maya, an Architect, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Maya's colleague has the opportunity to implement a new bike lane system throughout the city.
column3: The implementation of the bike lanes increases the prices for parking cars in the city.
column4: The new bike lane system encourages residents to cycle more.
column5: If Maya prevents her colleague's implementation of the bike lane system, there would not be an increase in parking prices.
column6: Maya does not prevent her colleague's implementation of the bike lane system.

column1: Alejandro, an Engineer, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Alejandro's colleague has the opportunity to upgrade the office coffee machine to a more efficient model.
column3: The new coffee machine brews coffee faster and consumes less electricity, providing a quicker, more energy-efficient way for employees to get their coffee.
column4: The new machine is noisier during brewing, causing disturbance to employees sitting nearby.
column5: If Alejandro prevents his colleague's upgrade of the coffee machine, there would not be a noise disturbance.
column6: Alejandro does not prevent his colleague's upgrade of the coffee machine.

column1: Amir, a Teacher, facehfs a moral dilemma.
column2: Amir's colleague has the opportunity to introduce an online homework submission system in his class.
column3: The online system streamlines the submission process, making it easier for students to turn in assignments and for Amir to track and grade their work efficiently.
column4: Some students who are less tech-savvy experience initial confusion and anxiety adapting to the new system.
column5: If Amir prevents his colleague's introduction of the online homework submission system, there would not be confusion and anxiety among less tech-savvy students.
column6: Amir does not prevent his colleague's introduction of the online homework submission system.

column1: Mei, a Nurse, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Mei's colleague has the opportunity to implement a new digital system for patient record-keeping in her clinic.
column3: The digital system improves the accuracy and accessibility of patient records, enhancing overall care quality.
column4: Some elderly patients feel uncomfortable with the new system, missing the personal touch of traditional methods.
column5: If Mei prevents her colleague's implementation of the new digital system, there would not be discomfort among elderly patients.
column6: Mei does not prevent her colleague's implementation of the new digital system.

column1: Amina, a Chef, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Amina's colleague has the opportunity to switch to biodegradable packaging for the restaurantâ€™s takeaway orders.
column3: The use of biodegradable packaging reduces the environmental impact of the restaurant's takeaway services.
column4: The new packaging alters the presentation of the food, with customers missing the previous style.
column5: If Amina prevents her colleague's switch to biodegradable packaging, there would not be an alteration in food presentation.
column6: Amina does not prevent her colleague's switch to biodegradable packaging.

column1: Isamu, an Artist, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Isamu's colleague has the opportunity to use a new type of eco-friendly paint for his artworks.
column3: This paint is less harmful to the environment and supports sustainable art practices.
column4: The new paint takes longer to dry, delaying Isamu's artwork completion times.
column5: If Isamu prevents his colleague's use of the new eco-friendly paint, there would not be a delay in his artwork completion times.
column6: Isamu does not prevent his colleague's use of the new eco-friendly paint.

column1: Sanaa, a Lawyer, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Sanaa's colleague has the opportunity to introduce a new software for document automation in her law firm.
column3: The software streamlines the preparation of legal documents, saving time and reducing human error.
column4: Junior staff members done learn drafting documents manually.
column5: If Sanaa prevents her colleague's introduction of the new software, junior staff members would continue to learn drafting documents manually.
column6: Sanaa does not prevent her colleague's introduction of the new software.

column1: Diego, a Mechanic, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Diego's colleague has the opportunity to use a new, more efficient hydraulic lift in his garage.
column3: The new lift allows for quicker and safer vehicle repairs, improving overall productivity.
column4: The new lift produces a low humming noise, which is distracting to workers.
column5: If Diego prevents his colleague's use of the new hydraulic lift, there would not be a distracting humming noise.
column6: Diego does not prevent his colleague's use of the new hydraulic lift.

column1: Amara, a Soldier, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Amara's colleague has the opportunity to participate in advanced virtual reality (VR) combat training.
column3: The VR training provides realistic scenarios.
column4: Some soldiers experience disorientation or dizziness after extended VR sessions.
column5: If Amara prevents her colleague's participation in the VR combat training, there would not be disorientation or dizziness.
column6: Amara does not prevent her colleague's participation in the VR combat training.

column1: Thanh, a Policeman, faces a moral dilemma.
column2: Thanh's colleague has the opportunity to implement a new digital reporting system.
column3: This system streamlines the reporting process, allowing for quicker responses.
column4: The system requires older officers to adapt to new technology, causing frustration.
column5: If Thanh prevents his colleague's implementation of the new digital reporting system for minor incidents, there would not be frustration among older officers.
column6: Thanh does not prevent his colleague's implementation of the new digital reporting system for minor incidents.
